TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CodeTypeReference extends System.CodeDom.CodeObject

span.span: Represents a reference to a type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件用來代表 CodeDOM 物件的類型。A object is used to represent a type for CodeDOM objects. 當有 CodeDOM 型別`Type`屬性，它是型別。When CodeDOM types have a `Type` property, it is of type . 例如，屬性是表示欄位的資料型別。For example, the property is a that represents a field's data type. A可以使用初始化物件或字串。A can be initialized with a object or a string. 通常建議使用若要這樣做，雖然它不一定可行。It is generally recommended to use a to do this, although it may not always be possible. 如果初始化這個類別的執行個體，強烈建議一律使用完整的類型，例如 「 System.Console"，而不只是 「 主控台 」，因為並非所有語言都支援匯入的命名空間。If initializing an instance of this class with a string, it is strongly recommended to always use fully qualified types, such as "System.Console" instead of just "Console", because not all languages support importing namespaces. 傳入的型別物件的陣列，或使用其中一個接受陣序規範做為參數的建構函式可以指定陣列類型。Array types can be specified by either passing in a type object for an array or using one of the constructors that accept rank as a parameter. 屬性會指定要參考的型別名稱。The property specifies the name of the type to reference. 陣列型別，參考屬性會指出陣列中的項目類型和屬性會指出陣列中的維度數目。For references to array types, the property indicates the type of the elements of the array, and the property indicates the number of dimensions in the array. ## Examples 下列範例示範使用來表示型別的參考。The following example demonstrates use of a to represent a reference to a type. [!code-cpp[CodeTypeOfExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeTypeOfExample/CPP/codetypeofexample.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CodeTypeOfExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeTypeOfExample/CS/codetypeofexample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CodeTypeOfExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeTypeOfExample/VB/codetypeofexample.vb#2)]

summary.span: 使用指定的型別名稱，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified type name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`typeName`參數參考的泛型型別，則必須遵守的泛型類型的語法慣例。If the `typeName` parameter references a generic type, it must follow the syntax conventions for generic types. 比方說，反映簽章型別，其中`K`是一個字串並`V`是的整數，表示由反映，如下所示 （與移除的組件資訊）： ``System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2[[System.String], [System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[System.Int32]]]]``。For example, the reflection signature for a type, where `K` is a string and `V` is a of integers, is represented by reflection as the following (with the assembly information removed): ``System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2[[System.String], [System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[System.Int32]]]]``. > [!NOTE] > 您必須使用方括號 ([]) 而非C#來分隔泛型參數的角括弧 （<>）。You must use square brackets ([]) and not the C# angle brackets (<>) to delimit generic parameters. 若要避免可能發生了什麼差錯中指定的語法，請考慮使用接受型別做為參數，而非字串的建構函式。To avoid the possibility of making a mistake in specifying the syntax, consider using the constructor that takes a type as a parameter instead of a string.

summary.span: 取得或設定要參考的型別名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the type being referenced.
The name of the type being referenced.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性包含型別的名稱，除非它是陣列型別，在此情況下，它是陣列元素型別。This property contains the name of the type unless it is an array type, in which case it is the array element type. > [!NOTE] > 屬性的名稱可能會產生誤導。The name of the property may be misleading. 此屬性包含型別名稱與任何陣列裝飾，或泛型類型引數中移除，不是基底或父類型可能會預期。This property contains just the type name with any array adornments or generic type arguments removed, not the base or parent type as might be expected. 例如，值``System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2[[System.String], [System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[System.Int32]]]]``是``System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2``。For example, the value for ``System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2[[System.String], [System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[System.Int32]]]]`` is ``System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2``. ## 表示泛型類型Representation of Generic Types 在本節中的資訊適用於 CodeDom 提供者開發人員，而且只適用於符合 CLS 標準的語言。The information in this section is intended for CodeDom provider developers and only applies to CLS-compliant languages. 傳回值可以包含泛型型別。The return value can contain generic types. 泛型型別的格式後面跟著抑音符號的類型名稱 ("'") 後面接著的泛型型別引數的計數。Generic types are formatted with the name of the type followed by a grave accent ("\`") followed by a count of the generic type arguments. 泛型類型引數篇所傳回屬性。The generic type arguments can be found in the returned by the property. 所傳回的值和相關聯包含相同的內容，以反映所傳回之型別的值。The values returned by and the associated contain the same content as the value of the type returned by reflection. 比方說，建構所在`K`是一個字串並`V`是建構整數的表示如下所示的反映 （與移除的組件資訊）：For example, a constructed where `K` is a string and `V` is a constructed of integers is represented by reflection as the following (with the assembly information removed): ``` System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2[[System.String], [System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[System.Int32]]]] ``` 以遞迴方式剖析屬性從如會產生為反映表示上述相同的字串：Recursively parsing the property from the for yields the same strings as the reflection representation above: - 父代屬性會傳回下列：The property for the parent returns the following: ``` System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2 ``` - 屬性的前物件中集合會傳回下列：The property for the first object in the collection returns the following: ``` System.String ``` - 屬性，第二個物件中集合會傳回下列：The property for the second object in the collection returns the following: ``` System.Collections.Generic.List`1 ``` - 中的屬性物件``System.Collections.Generic.List`1``會傳回下列：The property in the object for ``System.Collections.Generic.List`1`` returns the following: ``` System.Int32 ``` 剖析相關聯時，就應該使用的型別引數計數值。The type argument count should be used when parsing the associated values. 常見的做法是從產生的程式碼，移除類型引數計數，但的做法是特定的編譯器。The common practice is to remove the type argument count from the generated code, but the practice is compiler specific. 請務必請注意，巢狀的類型名稱內找不到型別引數計數，在此情況下它後面接著加號 （"+"）。It is important to note that the type argument count can be found within a nested type name, in which case it is followed by a plus sign ("+"). > [!NOTE] > 當建立泛型，建議的作法是指定為的型別引數物件，或使用的建構函式。When creating a generic , the recommended practice is to specify the type arguments as objects or use the constructor that takes a . 使用會建立建構函式從字串可能會導致 undiscoverable 的型別引數錯誤。Use of the constructor that creates a from a string can lead to undiscoverable type-argument errors.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TypeArguments As CodeTypeReferenceCollection

summary.span: 取得目前泛型型別參考的型別引數。

span.span: Gets the type arguments for the current generic type reference.

value.span: ，包含目前 物件的型別引數。

span.span: A containing the type arguments for the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是用來取代目前泛型型別的型別參數參考的型別參考的集合。The property is a collection of type references to be substituted for the type parameter references of the current generic type. 集合包含所有的巢狀類型的所有型別引數。The collection contains all the type arguments for all nested types. 如需範例，請參閱屬性。For an example, see the property.
